column5: Looking to get my brother out on the weekend.  I was thinking about fishing lake Joseph.  Does any one have any information on ice conditions for the area.  I'm just hoping it will hold up during the warm spell this week.  Thanks in advance. Tim

When we came down the highway on Monday night...just before sunset...every lake from North Bay to Midland was covered in at least a foot of slush, as was Temagami to boot. All current areas wide open. If you know there's lots of ice where you normally fish...shouldn't be an issue with some good high waterproof boots.
